name: Harmonic Shield Conduits
desc: Specialized gravitic conduits which are able to increase passive flux dissipation on a curve approaching %s/%s/%s/%s-percent of the ships current Hard Flux, depending on hull size.
short: Improves flux dissipation as hard flux rises.

name: Reduced Hangar
desc:
The hangar from these ships is too small for be 100% operationals
Increases the refit time of fighter by %s.
